name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sidebar Tab - pin Chat GPT-4o Gemini Claude in side bar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: pin ChatGPT-4o Gemini Claude in side bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sidebar Tab allows you to easily open web pages in a sidebar without breaking off your main browsing tasks. With this extension, you can pin any web page in the chrome sidebar: Chat GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini, etc. 

Copy the URL, paste url into the address bar, and it'll be stuck there forever, you can keep your focus on the main browser window. When you switch tabs, you can still see the fixed content in the sidebartab, making it easy to cross-reference, keep an eye on it.
